name: Bird 420 - MLG Flappy edition
description:
MLG Sample Text Bird 420 is finally here!

This is the top rated game ever and first MLG game ever confirmed by MLG pros which makes it the game of the century.

If you are real MLG pro and you like MLG montage parodies, you should like this game, cause it's made by fans for fans and for the good of all mankid.

Get at least 420 score if you ever quickscope m8!

SPOOKY WARNING: turn down ur volume lel(

Features:

- Simple touch controls
- IZI and fun to play
- Get as high as you can
- MLG with SWAG
- SAMPLE TEXT
- Cool power ups!

As and MLG PRO you can 360 no scope, 420 blaze it and smoke vid everyday

PS. IF TAP WITH FACE THEN +10 SKILL LEL =]

Our official website: http://mlgflappybird420.com/
